title: The Next Stage in the LIBOR Transition (via prerecorded video)
content: For release on delivery  9:10 a.m. EDT  June 3, 2019      The Next Stage in the LIBOR Transition  (via prerecorded video)    Remarks by     Randal K. Quarles     Vice Chair for Supervision     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at the     Alternative Reference Rates Committee Roundtable, cohosted by  the Alternative Reference Rates Committee and   the New York University Stern School of Business and Its Salomon Center   for the Study of Financial Institutions     New York, New York    June 3, 2019
